config.empyrean.category.stable.descript: Contains stable tested options for Empyrean
config.empyrean.group.effects.tooltip: Different options related to Empyrean effects. This is related to vanilla effects, not VFX.
config.empyrean.option.compactEffectDisp: Renders effects in inventory more compactly to leave space for more effects.
config.empyrean.option.alwaysDisplayEffe: Always display effects, even outside of inventory.
config.empyrean.group.expSingleplayer.to: Different options related to singleplayer for Empyrean. Highly experimental.
config.empyrean.option.enableSingleplaye: Allows to play Empyrean in singleplayer
